spec_ref.quote: BuildBinary, CrossCompile, RunTests - Build system targets

files.purpose: Build commands for compile, test, cross-compile to darwin, linux, windows

acceptance_criteria.criterion: make build compiles tasker binary for current platform
make test runs all Go tests with coverage
make cross-compile builds for darwin/amd64, darwin/arm64, linux/amd64
make lint runs golangci-lint on codebase
